00025 #ifndef _BASE_OBJECT_
00026 #define _BASE_OBJECT_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 
00030 namespace base {
00031 
00032 
00033 /** Base class/standard interface for objects which require
00034     IO support
00035 */
00036 
00037 class Object
00038 {
00039 public:
00040   /** Construct an object. Note Object is a pure virtual base class
00041       and therefore cannot be constructed on its own, only derived
00042       classes which overide the clone and className methods are
00043       concrete classes and can be constructed.*/
00044   Object() {}
00045   virtual ~Object() {}
00046   
00047   virtual bool isSameKindAs(const Object&) const { return true; }
00048   
00049   /** return the name of the object's class type. Must be defined
00050       by derived classes.*/
00051   virtual String className() const = 0;
00052   
00053 protected:
00054   Object(const Object&) {}
00055   Object& operator=(const Object&) { return *this; }
00056 };
00057 
00058 
00059 } // base
00060 
00061 #endif
